1.content: Design UI/UX for Smart YouTube Video Player feature
1.details:
Design comprehensive interface including:
- Video Queue Manager (add, remove, reorder videos)
- YouTube Search & Browse interface
- Smart Recommendations panel
- Scheduling interface (set play times)
- OBS Player View (broadcast display)
- Analytics dashboard (track engagement)
- Control panel (play, pause, skip, volume)
- Video preview with thumbnail and metadata

2.content: Build Smart YouTube Video Player feature
2.details:
Implement full-stack application:
- YouTube API integration (search, metadata, embed)
- Video queue management system
- Supabase database (video queue, play history, preferences, engagement data)
- Smart recommendation engine (category-based, history-based, engagement-based)
- Scheduling system (auto-play at specified times)
- OBS broadcast view integration
- Control dashboard with real-time sync
- Analytics and tracking
- Start/end time markers for video clips
